name: Queen-Jesi
description: QueenJesi project - Makes it easy and fun to use Whatsapp.

A_JESI_SESSION.description: Qr.Coad, Type here yours Jesi Session.

SUDO.description: Leave blank if you don't know how to use it! Sudo mode; Your number must be an international number. So you should have your number after the country code. Example: 947xxxxxxx (SL number +94)

AUTO_BIO.description: Set true for auto date, time in biography.

AI_JESI.description: Turn your account into a chatbot!

NO_LOG.description: Set true if you don't want to see error log.

SEND_READ.description: Write true if you want to throw seen.

HEROKU.description: If it is running in Heroku, type true.

MUTE_MESSAGE.description: Customizable Mute Message! Use => default, to change back.

BLOCK_CHAT.description: Choose in which chat the bot won't work there. Ex: 947xxxxxxx && 947xxxxxxx or 947xxxxxxx,947xxxxxxx...

UNMUTE_MESSAGE.description: Customizable Unmute Message! Use => default, to change back.

BLOCK_MESSAGE.description: Customizable Block Message! Use => default, to change back.

UNBLOCK_MESSAGE.description: Customizable Unblock Message! Use => default, to change back.

WORK_TYPE.description: QueenJesi Working Type. If you use “public”, everyone can use the bot. Else if you use “private”, only you can use your bot.

HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: Heroku APP Name. Must be the same as the App name!

DEBUG.description: For Developers => all, info, warn, fatal, error, debug, off

BAD_KICK.description: Remove Badword Senders from the Group.

LINK_BAN.description: Remove Whatsapp Group link Senders from the Group.

WELCOME_GIF.description: Set Custom Welcome Gif Past Direct Link of Mp4 or gif

GOODBYE_GIF.description: Set Custom Good Bye Gif Past Direct Link of Mp4 or Gif

CMD_EMOJI.description: This Is Menu Cmd Emoji You Can Change It Here.

DESC_EMOJI.description: This Is Menu Desc Emoji You Can Change It Here.

ALIVE_MESSAGE.description: Customizable Alive Message! Use => default, to Change back.

BAN_MESSAGE.description: Customizable Ban Message! Use => default, to change back.

ADD_MESSAGE.description: Customizable Add Message! Use => default, to change back.

KICKME_MESSAGE.description: Customizable Kickme Message! Use => default, to change back.

PROMOTE_MESSAGE.description: Customizable Promote Message! Use => default, to change back.

DEMOTE_MESSAGE.description: Customizable Demote Message! Use => default, to change back.

AFK_MESSAGE.description: Customizable AFK Message! Use => default, to change back.

GAN_IMAGE.description: Type Image Link for Gan Style Plugin.

NO_ONLINE.description: Type true if you don't want to appear online.
